DOC.brief_summary: A multi-center, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial to evaluate the efficacy and safety of 'Ursa Complex Soft Cap. (UDCA-004)' in patients with physical fatigue.
DOC.brief_title: A Multi-center, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of 'Ursa Complex Soft Cap. (UDCA-004)' in Patients With Physical Fatigue.
DOC.criteria: CIS greater than or equal to 76, HADS less than or equal to 10 Subjects who have diseases that can cause fatigue Subjects who are taking medication that can cause fatigue
